div.p: T. Vaillant de Guélis and H. Chepfer primarily conceived the idea and designed the research. T. Vaillant de Guélis and R. Guzman conducted the data analysis. M. Bonazzola conducted the model simulations. D. M. Winker and V. Noel contributed through discussions and interpretations of the results. All the authors contributed to write the paper.
